Orphapacket.Label: Cushing syndrome due to cortisol-producing adrenocortical adenoma

Synonyms.Synonym: CS due to cortisol-producing adrenocortical adenoma

TextSection.Contents: A form of adrenal Cushing syndrome an endogenous Cushing syndrome (CS) characterized by chronic over-secretion of cortisol due to a benign adrenal tumor that arises from the adrenal cortex.
